data.title: Billy Two Hats Original 1974 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1974 U.S. one sheet poster for the film Billy Two Hats directed by Ted Kotcheff with Gregory Peck / Desi Arnaz Jr. / Jack Warden / David Huddleston.
